StringTable.String: Reduce the Mass of drive, life support and sensor systems.

StringTable.Label: MasterGravitonicSpecialization3_Dec
StringTable.String: By specializing in our gravitonic technologies, we have been able to shrink the components required to explore the galaxy, giving us a substantial edge over the natives when looking for new worlds.

StringTable.Label: MasterGravitonicManipulating_Name
StringTable.String: Gravitonic Manipulation

StringTable.Label: MasterGravitonicManipulating_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increase Hull Capacity of our ships.

StringTable.Label: MasterGravitonicManipulating_Dec
StringTable.String: With further study, we have been able to push our knowledge of gravitonic to new levels. Our ships can now carry even more components of all kinds.

StringTable.Label: MasterGravitonicMastery_Name
StringTable.String: Gravitonic Mastery

StringTable.Label: MasterGravitonicMastery_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increase Hull Capacity of our ships.

StringTable.Label: MasterGravitonicMastery_Dec
StringTable.String: We have mastered mass and gravity to the point that our ships can new carry more equipment than any other race in this universe.

StringTable.Label: MasterInterstellarResupply_Name
StringTable.String: Interstellar Resupply

StringTable.Label: MasterInterstellarResupply_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases Logistics and Starbase efficiency

StringTable.Label: MasterInterstellarResupply_Dec
StringTable.String: The value of a supply chain is not often appreciated. However, our ability to send vital supplies from planet side to orbiting or interstellar ships and starbases is a matter of life and death. This breakthrough is less about new technologies and more of a series of innovations in how to efficiently gain goods and services from our planets to our dependents in space.

StringTable.Label: MasterInterstellarLogistics_Name
StringTable.String: Interstellar Logistics

StringTable.Label: MasterInterstellarLogistics_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of mining facilities. Increases Logistics.

StringTable.Label: MasterInterstellarLogistics_Dec
StringTable.String: It's one thing to build a ship, it's another thing to keep it running. None of this is exciting of course. Logistics officers are some of the most boring people you're ever likely to meet. But a necessary evil.

StringTable.Label: MasterFleetLogisticsTech_Name
StringTable.String: Fleet Logistics

StringTable.Label: MasterFleetLogisticsTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Greatly increases Logistics.

StringTable.Label: MasterFleetLogisticsTech_Dec
StringTable.String: Scaling up our naval operations to include large multi-vessel fleets has created a number of additional logistical challenges which we're only just now coming to grips with. We'll definitely stop sending ships out without oxygen now though.

StringTable.Label: MasterDeepSpaceLogistics_Name
StringTable.String: Deep Space Logistics

StringTable.Label: MasterDeepSpaceLogistics_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Greatly increases Logistics.

StringTable.Label: MasterDeepSpaceLogistics_Dec
StringTable.String: Whether it's via unmanned probes, deep space caches, or our network of merchant vessels, keeping our fleets well stocked while our civilization expands has proven to be a tremendous, but still very boring, challenge.

StringTable.Label: MasterGalacticLogistics_Name
StringTable.String: Galactic Logistics

StringTable.Label: MasterGalacticLogistics_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Greatly increases Logistics.

StringTable.Label: MasterGalacticLogistics_Dec
StringTable.String: Our mastery of mass-scale logistics is the envy of the galaxy. Well. The part of the galaxy which gets excited about logistics.

StringTable.Label: MasterInterstellarMining_Name
StringTable.String: Interstellar Mining

StringTable.Label: MasterInterstellarMining_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of mining facilities.

StringTable.Label: MasterInterstellarMining_Dec
StringTable.String: We can't have ships without the resources to build them. The same can be said for lots of things actually. Improved mining technologies will benefit every aspect of our civilization. At least the aspects of our civilization which require building things.

StringTable.Label: MasterHighEfficiencyMining_Name
StringTable.String: High Efficiency Mining

StringTable.Label: MasterHighEfficiencyMining_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved mining facilities.

StringTable.Label: MasterHighEfficiencyMining_Dec
StringTable.String: Our mining operations are capable of generating more resources while losing less miners than ever before. The miners rejoice! Well. Not rejoice, exactly. They seem less grumpy than usual. Still, that's something.

StringTable.Label: MasterResourceExtraction_Name
StringTable.String: Resource Extraction

StringTable.Label: MasterResourceExtraction_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced mining facilities.

StringTable.Label: MasterResourceExtraction_Dec
StringTable.String: Valuable resources can be found in most asteroids in extremely low concentrations. Extracting these hasn't been practical until the development of probes capable of independently navigating the subsurface to collect the goodies within.

StringTable.Label: MasterLosslessMining_Name
StringTable.String: Lossless Mining

StringTable.Label: MasterLosslessMining_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of targeted resource extractor modules.

StringTable.Label: MasterLosslessMining_Dec
StringTable.String: Miniaturizing our resource extraction probes to the nano-scale has allowed for almost perfectly lossless resource extraction. Additionally, the rarest of rare resources can now feasibly be targeted for extraction.

StringTable.Label: MasterWarfareTech_Name
StringTable.String: Warfare

StringTable.Label: MasterWarfareTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows research of weapons technologies.

StringTable.Label: MasterWarfareTech_Dec
StringTable.String: We can't be naive about who or what we might find in the galaxy. From this point on, our ships must be armed, whether to protect against a yet unseen enemy, or even ourselves.

StringTable.Label: MasterMilitarizationTech_Name
StringTable.String: Militarization

StringTable.Label: MasterMilitarizationTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Begins us on the path to building a space navy.

StringTable.Label: MasterMilitarizationTech_Dec
StringTable.String: We already have a significant amount of structures in orbit and on the ground, all of which can be militarized with modest extra investment and some new uniforms.

StringTable.Label: MasterWeaponsSystemsTech_Name
StringTable.String: Weapons Systems

StringTable.Label: MasterWeaponsSystemsTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of basic weapon systems.

StringTable.Label: MasterWeaponsSystemsTech_Dec
StringTable.String: The best defense is a good offense. Interestingly, so is the best offense. With that in mind, we've developed weapon systems which should prove very well suited to space-based defense. And, as discussed, offense.

StringTable.Label: MasterBeamWeapons_Name
StringTable.String: Beam Weapons

StringTable.Label: MasterBeamWeapons_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved beam weapons.

StringTable.Label: MasterBeamWeapons_Dec
StringTable.String: Whether light, particles, or both at the same time, there's an awful lot of destructive potential in suddenly sending a lot of it all at one place.

StringTable.Label: MasterBeamWeaponOptimization1_Name
StringTable.String: Focused Beam Weapons

StringTable.Label: MasterBeamWeaponOptimization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases damage of beam weapons.

StringTable.Label: MasterBeamWeaponOptimization1_Dec
StringTable.String: A new generation of the ultra-transparent materials we use in our focusing crystals has made it possible to increase the damage output of our beam weapons.

StringTable.Label: MasterBeamWeaponOptimization_Name
StringTable.String: Beam Weapon Optimization

StringTable.Label: MasterBeamWeaponOptimization_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves beam weapons.

StringTable.Label: MasterBeamWeaponOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: Weapons researchers have to keep paces with advances in many other fields to get the most out of their inventions. Right now, recent advances in material sciences are opening the door to a new generation of more efficient weapons.

StringTable.Label: MasterBeamWeaponOptimization2_Name
StringTable.String: Low-Cost Beam Weapons

StringTable.Label: MasterBeamWeaponOptimization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces cost of beam weapons.

StringTable.Label: MasterBeamWeaponOptimization2_Dec
StringTable.String: Beam weapons will never be cheap, but some economies of scale have led to price reductions in the magnification and focusing equipment these weapons rely upon.

StringTable.Label: MasterBeamWeaponOptimization3_Name
StringTable.String: Beam Weapons Miniaturization

StringTable.Label: MasterBeamWeaponOptimization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces mass of beam weapons.

StringTable.Label: MasterBeamWeaponOptimization3_Dec
StringTable.String: Lacking the requirements for ammunition storage, beam weapons have always been mass-efficient. And after some hard work by the boys and girls in the lab, now they're a bit more so.

StringTable.Label: MasterBeamWeaponMiniaturization_Name
StringTable.String: Beam Weapon Miniaturization

StringTable.Label: MasterBeamWeaponMiniaturization_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows us to fit more beam weapons into a particular space.

StringTable.Label: MasterBeamWeaponMiniaturization_Dec
StringTable.String: Engineers, as opposed to scientists, have figured out new manufacturing techniques to allow for beam weapons to be produced using far less mass and space.

StringTable.Label: MasterMatterDisruption_Name
StringTable.String: Matter Disruption

StringTable.Label: MasterMatterDisruption_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced beam weapons.

StringTable.Label: MasterMatterDisruption_Dec
StringTable.String: Our researchers have been able to weaponize a collimated beam of particles capable of disrupting the strong nuclear force, severing the bonds which hold the nucleus together, turning matter into smaller chunks of matter.

StringTable.Label: MasterPlasmaProjection_Name
StringTable.String: Plasma Projection

StringTable.Label: MasterPlasmaProjection_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of exotic beam weapons.

StringTable.Label: MasterPlasmaProjection_Dec
StringTable.String: We're now able to generate collimated plasma containment fields at incredible distances. The upshot to this is that we can now send massive quantities of plasma at relativistic velocities in the direction of anything we don't like very much.

StringTable.Label: MasterEnergyPhasing_Name
StringTable.String: Energy Phasing

StringTable.Label: MasterEnergyPhasing_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of devastating beam weapons.

StringTable.Label: MasterEnergyPhasing_Dec
StringTable.String: The phaser particle is almost impossible to understand if you don't have several advanced degrees and possibly an extra brain. In short, these particles can induce a chain reaction that breaks an enemy down into neutrinos, effectively evaporating it.

StringTable.Label: MasterDoomRayTech_Name
StringTable.String: Doom Ray

StringTable.Label: MasterDoomRayTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of the ultimate beam weapons.

StringTable.Label: MasterDoomRayTech_Dec
StringTable.String: An adaptation of the phaser particle emitter has resulted in massive improvements in the induced matter-breakdown reaction. Also of note, our scientists are pretty sure the reaction won't consume the entire universe. So that's good news.

StringTable.Label: MasterBeamWeaponAugmentation_Name
StringTable.String: Beam Weapon Augmentation

StringTable.Label: MasterBeamWeaponAugmentation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of beam support systems.

StringTable.Label: MasterBeamWeaponAugmentation_Dec
StringTable.String: We've found that the capacity of our beam energy storage systems can be augmented by an external field, which allows for increased beam output. Such fields could be projected at a distance, improving the beam output of an entire fleet.

StringTable.Label: MasterHighEnergyTransfer_Name
StringTable.String: High Energy Transfer

StringTable.Label: MasterHighEnergyTransfer_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved beam support systems.

StringTable.Label: MasterHighEnergyTransfer_Dec
StringTable.String: After considerable study in the way that beam weapons interact on a subatomic level with both shield systems and hulls, we've developed systems capable of reducing the effectiveness of enemy shields or absorbing enemy beam attacks on our own vessels.

StringTable.Label: MasterHighEnergyMagnification_Name
StringTable.String: High Energy Magnification

StringTable.Label: MasterHighEnergyMagnification_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced beam support systems.

StringTable.Label: MasterHighEnergyMagnification_Dec
StringTable.String: An improved understanding of the effects our beam augmentation fields have has resulted in the possibility of even greater beam outputs. Additionally, we can now build beams that can cripple enemy shields.

StringTable.Label: MasterMissileWeapons_Name
StringTable.String: Missile Weapons

StringTable.Label: MasterMissileWeapons_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved missile weapons.

StringTable.Label: MasterMissileWeapons_Dec
StringTable.String: Conceptually simple, though there's no shame in that, missile-based weapons provide a tremendous amount of punch for their cost.

StringTable.Label: MasterMissileOptimization1_Name
StringTable.String: Rapid Fire Missiles

StringTable.Label: MasterMissileOptimization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases firing speed of missile weapons.

StringTable.Label: MasterMissileOptimization1_Dec
StringTable.String: Our weapons engineers have determined that shooting more missiles at things makes them blow up faster. Which seems obvious in retrospect. Anyways, our missile launchers shoot more now.

StringTable.Label: MasterMissileOptimization_Name
StringTable.String: Missile Optimization

StringTable.Label: MasterMissileOptimization_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves missile weapons.

StringTable.Label: MasterMissileOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: After blowing up several thousand target drones and one unfortunate asteroid, our weapons engineers have come up with a number of possible improvements we can implement for our missile platforms.

StringTable.Label: MasterMissileOptimization2_Name
StringTable.String: Low Cost Missiles

StringTable.Label: MasterMissileOptimization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces cost of missile weapons.

StringTable.Label: MasterMissileOptimization2_Dec
StringTable.String: Missiles were always going to be the most cost-effective means of making things hurt, and now they're a little bit more so.

StringTable.Label: MasterMissileOptimization3_Name
StringTable.String: Missile Miniaturization

StringTable.Label: MasterMissileOptimization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces mass of missile weapons.

StringTable.Label: MasterMissileOptimization3_Dec
StringTable.String: Reviews of training data and engagement encounters reveals one overriding request from the field. "We want more missiles. Give us more missiles." Well, having reduced the mass of our launchers and ammunition racks, we're now able to do just that.

StringTable.Label: MasterHarpoonTech_Name
StringTable.String: Harpoons

StringTable.Label: MasterHarpoonTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced missile weapons.

StringTable.Label: MasterHarpoonTech_Dec
StringTable.String: The Harpoon class of missiles employ a number of improvements in speed, range, tracking, and warhead yield, resulting in our most powerful conventional missile system yet.

StringTable.Label: MasterMissileMiniautrization_Name
StringTable.String: Missile Miniaturization

StringTable.Label: MasterMissileMiniautrization_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows for smaller missiles that deliver the same payload.

StringTable.Label: MasterMissileMiniautrization_Dec
StringTable.String: The amazing engineering team, picking up where scientists failed, have developed a new type of casing for housing explosive warheads which should allow for literally more bang for something something.

StringTable.Label: MasterPhotonicWarheads_Name
StringTable.String: Photonic Warheads

StringTable.Label: MasterPhotonicWarheads_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of exotic missile weapons.

StringTable.Label: MasterPhotonicWarheads_Dec
StringTable.String: By embedding a device in our warheads which releases a high-energy burst of photons at the moment of impact, we can achieve substantial penetration against both armor and shield systems, greatly increasing the destructive potential of our warheads.

StringTable.Label: MasterPhotonTorpedos_Name
StringTable.String: Photon Torpedoes

StringTable.Label: MasterPhotonTorpedos_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of devastating missile weapons.

StringTable.Label: MasterPhotonTorpedos_Dec
StringTable.String: By matching a wide-spectrum version of the photon-encasement armor piercing technology with our latest anti-matter warheads, we've created a weapon with truly colossal damage potential. They glow a new color too.

StringTable.Label: MasterNightmareTorpedoTech_Name
StringTable.String: Nightmare Torpedoes

StringTable.Label: MasterNightmareTorpedoTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of the ultimate missile weapons.

StringTable.Label: MasterNightmareTorpedoTech_Dec
StringTable.String: The Nightmare torpedo contains a tiny singularity trapped in a pocket universe, which upon being released causes horrifying damage to anything foolish enough to be standing by a place we're firing something called Nightmare Torpedoes at.

StringTable.Label: MasterMissileAugmentation_Name
StringTable.String: Missile Augmentation

StringTable.Label: MasterMissileAugmentation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of missile support systems.

StringTable.Label: MasterMissileAugmentation_Dec
StringTable.String: Our weapons researchers have come up with a number of ship and starbase modules which can improve the tracking and ultimately the range of our missiles.

StringTable.Label: MasterAdvancedMissileGuidance_Name
StringTable.String: Advanced Missile Guidance

StringTable.Label: MasterAdvancedMissileGuidance_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved missile support systems.

StringTable.Label: MasterAdvancedMissileGuidance_Dec
StringTable.String: Improved decoy and camouflage systems will greatly increase the survivability of our missiles when faced with point defenses. And our missile support modules now feature a number of predictive systems which should help missile range even more.

StringTable.Label: MasterIntelligentWarheads_Name
StringTable.String: Intelligent Warheads

StringTable.Label: MasterIntelligentWarheads_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced missile support systems.

StringTable.Label: MasterIntelligentWarheads_Dec
StringTable.String: Cluster warheads are capable of specifically targeting and neutralizing enemy point defense systems. And our missile support systems can now make use of information-sharing "pilot" missiles, which allow for more efficient guidance and improved range.

StringTable.Label: MasterKineticWeapons_Name
StringTable.String: Kinetic Weapons

StringTable.Label: MasterKineticWeapons_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved kinetic weapons.

StringTable.Label: MasterKineticWeapons_Dec
StringTable.String: There's just something nice and honest about a projectile, isn't there? And thanks to a little help from teams of massive electromagnets, we've now got some extremely fast projectiles to work with.

StringTable.Label: MasterKineticOptimization1_Name
StringTable.String: Kinetic Range Extension

StringTable.Label: MasterKineticOptimization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases range of kinetic weapons.

StringTable.Label: MasterKineticOptimization1_Dec
StringTable.String: A switch to slightly smaller projectiles, along with improved energy delivery systems, has led to significant improvements in the speed of each projectile, and thus the effective range of each unit.

StringTable.Label: MasterKineticOptimization_Name
StringTable.String: Kinetic Optimization

StringTable.Label: MasterKineticOptimization_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves kinetic weapons.

StringTable.Label: MasterKineticOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: Some modest improvements in the energy delivery systems of our kinetic weapons could result in improvements to the cost, mass, or range of each unit.

StringTable.Label: MasterKineticOptimization2_Name
StringTable.String: Kinetic Weapon Manufacturing

StringTable.Label: MasterKineticOptimization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces cost of kinetic weapons.

StringTable.Label: MasterKineticOptimization2_Dec
StringTable.String: Never before have we needed to make electromagnetic coils in such quantity, and the early days of kinetic weapons were plagued by supply problems. But that's finally been addressed, and we should see cost savings across all of our kinetic weapon programs.

StringTable.Label: MasterKineticOptimization3_Name
StringTable.String: Kinetic Miniaturization

StringTable.Label: MasterKineticOptimization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces mass of kinetic weapons.

StringTable.Label: MasterKineticOptimization3_Dec
StringTable.String: Some experiments with the winding patterns of our electromagnetic coils has revealed a number of subtle synergistic effects which we can take advantage of, leading to tighter, more compact coils, and ultimately, lower mass weapons.

StringTable.Label: MasterPulseCannonTech_Name
StringTable.String: Pulse Cannons

StringTable.Label: MasterPulseCannonTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced kinetic weapons.

StringTable.Label: MasterPulseCannonTech_Dec
StringTable.String: Tight clusters of particles emitted at high velocity gets around some of the practical limitations of slug based mass drivers. These pulse cannons have similar tactical characteristics as previous kinetic weapons. They're just more powerful.

StringTable.Label: MasterHyperfieldMassLaunchers_Name
StringTable.String: Hyper Field Mass Launchers

StringTable.Label: MasterHyperfieldMassLaunchers_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Decreases the size needed for kinetic based weapons.

StringTable.Label: MasterHyperfieldMassLaunchers_Dec
StringTable.String: While the engineers continue to find a more efficient way to throw rocks, our scientists have solved the problem by developing an entirely new launching system based on creating a sub-space field within the chamber.

StringTable.Label: MasterGravitonThrower_Name
StringTable.String: Graviton Thrower

StringTable.Label: MasterGravitonThrower_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of exotic kinetic weapons.

StringTable.Label: MasterGravitonThrower_Dec
StringTable.String: By launching pulses of gravitons, we can induce massive shifts in the local gravity of enemy ships that they strike. This will cause incredible amounts of damage, and probably make anyone standing nearby feel really dizzy right before they die.

StringTable.Label: MasterQuantumDrivers_Name
StringTable.String: Quantum Drivers

StringTable.Label: MasterQuantumDrivers_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of devastating kinetic weapons.

StringTable.Label: MasterQuantumDrivers_Dec
StringTable.String: Quantum drivers fire shells that contain small quantum fields which pull in a tremendous amount of mass from a neighboring dimension on impact. We're not sure which dimension. We can only hope that they didn't need that mass.

StringTable.Label: MasterSingularityDrivers_Name
StringTable.String: Singularity Drivers

StringTable.Label: MasterSingularityDrivers_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of the ultimate kinetic weapons.

StringTable.Label: MasterSingularityDrivers_Dec
StringTable.String: The pinnacle of kinetic weapon technology, these launch micro singularities that collapse into existence shortly after impact. These are bad news, the worst news really, for anyone who can't get out of the way.

StringTable.Label: MasterKineticAugmentation_Name
StringTable.String: Kinetic Augmentation

StringTable.Label: MasterKineticAugmentation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of kinetic support systems.

StringTable.Label: MasterKineticAugmentation_Dec
StringTable.String: Inertial dampening should be impossible in this universe, which is why we were a little surprised we were able to pull it off. We've used this stroke of luck to create systems which can boost the velocity and effective range of our kinetic weapons.

StringTable.Label: MasterMassManipulation_Name
StringTable.String: Mass Manipulation

StringTable.Label: MasterMassManipulation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved kinetic support systems.

StringTable.Label: MasterMassManipulation_Dec
StringTable.String: We can now embed inertial modification tech inside projectiles, allowing them to generate ultra-dense outer surfaces for a brief period to improve their armor penetrating capabilities. And our kinetic augmentation systems have gotten a bit better.

StringTable.Label: MasterInertialMagnification_Name
StringTable.String: Inertial Magnification

StringTable.Label: MasterInertialMagnification_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced kinetic support systems.

StringTable.Label: MasterInertialMagnification_Dec
StringTable.String: Our projectiles are now capable of attacking armor directly, creating low density fissures that can cause the whole structure to splinter. Additionally our kinetic augmentation systems have increased their range boosting effects yet again.

StringTable.Label: MasterWarMachine_Name
StringTable.String: War College

StringTable.Label: MasterWarMachine_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows training of Commanders

StringTable.Label: MasterWarMachine_Dec
StringTable.String: Only the best of the best can go to the war college. The end result are an elite breed of leader, the Commander.

StringTable.Label: MasterSporeWeapon_Name
StringTable.String: Spore Weapon

StringTable.Label: MasterSporeWeapon_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows for the construction of the Spore Weapon.

StringTable.Label: MasterSporeWeapon_Dec
StringTable.String: Allows for the creation of the Spore Weapon, which can be used to completely exterminate a planets population, and render the planet Toxic.

StringTable.Label: MasterDimensionalWeapons_Name
StringTable.String: Dimensional Weapons

StringTable.Label: MasterDimensionalWeapons_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increase the Attack of all weapons types.

StringTable.Label: MasterDimensionalWeapons_Dec
StringTable.String: By pulling power from extra-dimensional sources we can make our weapons exceed the limitation of this universe's laws.

StringTable.Label: MasterDimensionalWeaponFocus1_Name
StringTable.String: Beam Shifting

StringTable.Label: MasterDimensionalWeaponFocus1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increase Accuracy of our beam weapons.

StringTable.Label: MasterDimensionalWeaponFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: Through dimensional shifting we are able to make our beam weapons target slightly into the future, greatly increasing their accuracy.

StringTable.Label: MasterDimensionalWeaponFocus_Name
StringTable.String: Dimensional Shifting Weapons

StringTable.Label: MasterDimensionalWeaponFocus_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increase Accuracy of our beam weapons.

StringTable.Label: MasterDimensionalWeaponFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: By manipulating dimensional shift we can make our weapons systems more accurate.

StringTable.Label: MasterDimensionalWeaponFocus2_Name
StringTable.String: Missile Shifting

StringTable.Label: MasterDimensionalWeaponFocus2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increase Accuracy of our missile weapons.

StringTable.Label: MasterDimensionalWeaponFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: Through dimensional shifting we are able to make our missile weapons target slightly into the future, greatly increasing their accuracy.

StringTable.Label: MasterDimensionalWeaponFocus3_Name
StringTable.String: Kinetic Shifting

StringTable.Label: MasterDimensionalWeaponFocus3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increase Accuracy of our kinetic weapons.

StringTable.Label: MasterDimensionalWeaponFocus3_Dec
StringTable.String: Through dimensional shifting we are able to make our kinetic weapons target slightly into the future, greatly increasing their accuracy.

StringTable.Label: MasterTerritorialReinforcement_Name
StringTable.String: Territorial Reinforcement

StringTable.Label: MasterTerritorialReinforcement_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows for the construction of special military starbase modules that can be built on any starbase.

StringTable.Label: MasterTerritorialReinforcement_Dec
StringTable.String: Recent experiences have taught us that the best way to ensure our planets remain unmolested is to keep our enemies far, far away from them. By adding military capacity to even our most utilitarian starbases, we will ensure our forces always have a safe place to rally and resupply.

StringTable.Label: MasterReinforcementOptimization1_Name
StringTable.String: Starbase Reinforcement

StringTable.Label: MasterReinforcementOptimization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increase the hitpoints of all Starbases

StringTable.Label: MasterReinforcementOptimization1_Dec
StringTable.String: As our Empire expands, we find it increasingly important to ensure that our starbases are well protected, able to withstand raids from the most aggressive pirates.

StringTable.Label: MasterReinforcementOptimization_Name
StringTable.String: Reinforcement Optimization

StringTable.Label: MasterReinforcementOptimization_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves Starbase Defenses

StringTable.Label: MasterReinforcementOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: Our Starbase commanders have great political power, and insist more resources be spent on increasing their defensive capacity.

StringTable.Label: MasterReinforcementOptimization2_Name
StringTable.String: Starbase Guardians

StringTable.Label: MasterReinforcementOptimization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: All starbases receive 2 Intercepter drones to augment their exsiting defenses.

StringTable.Label: MasterReinforcementOptimization2_Dec
StringTable.String: Every weapon counts when it comes to defending Arcean territory. By installing Interceptor drones on all existing starbases, we're able to better secure our territory and resources.

StringTable.Label: MasterStarbaseFortification_Name
StringTable.String: Starbase Fortification

StringTable.Label: MasterStarbaseFortification_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Alows for the building of the Intersteller Defense Module on any starbase.

StringTable.Label: MasterStarbaseFortification_Dec
StringTable.String: Our research teams have found a way to install military grade defense augmentation systems on non-military starbases. With this breakthrough, we should be able to better secure our borders and protect our worlds and assets.

StringTable.Label: MasterStarbaseFortificationFocus1_Name
StringTable.String: Starbase Battle Coordination

StringTable.Label: MasterStarbaseFortificationFocus1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the weapons strength of all weapons on our starbases

StringTable.Label: MasterStarbaseFortificationFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: Using a recent breakthrough in field-of-fire coordination, we have been able to design a firmware update for our starbase defense modules that increases the damage dealt by existing weapons systems.

StringTable.Label: MasterStarbaseFortificationFocus_Name
StringTable.String: Starbase Fortification Focus

StringTable.Label: MasterStarbaseFortificationFocus_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves Starbase Fortifications

StringTable.Label: MasterStarbaseFortificationFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: The Arcean people grow anxious at the threats the galaxy poses, and insist that more resources be spent to increase our Empire's fortifications.

StringTable.Label: MasterStarbaseFortificationFocus2_Name
StringTable.String: Starbase Defense Coordination

StringTable.Label: MasterStarbaseFortificationFocus2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the defenses of all starbases

StringTable.Label: MasterStarbaseFortificationFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: A new scaled-up version of our integrity field strengthening technology allows us to boost the overall defenses of all of our starbases.

StringTable.Label: MasterZalonDefenseSystemTech_Name
StringTable.String: Zalon Defense System

StringTable.Label: MasterZalonDefenseSystemTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Build the Zalon Defense system on a starbase or ship.

StringTable.Label: MasterZalonDefenseSystemTech_Dec
StringTable.String: Our research efforts into starbase fortification have proven quite fruitful. The Zalon Defense System will not only be the most advanced 'civilian' starbase defense array in the known galaxy, it will also be small enough to be equipped on a ship.

StringTable.Label: MasterPlanetaryInvasion_Name
StringTable.String: Planetary Invasion

StringTable.Label: MasterPlanetaryInvasion_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows transport modules to be constructed. Provides 10 legions.

StringTable.Label: MasterPlanetaryInvasion_Dec
StringTable.String: We've developed the equipment and tactics necessary to land on a world and take it by force. A little hard to imagine it, but we must accept that humans are now the alien invaders.

StringTable.Label: MasterNonCrusadePlanetaryInvasion_Name
StringTable.String: Planetary Invasion

StringTable.Label: MasterNonCrusadePlanetaryInvasion_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows transport modules to be constructed.

StringTable.Label: MasterNonCrusadePlanetaryInvasion_Dec
StringTable.String: We've developed the equipment and tactics necessary to land on a world and take it by force. A little hard to imagine it, but we must accept that humans are now the alien invaders.

StringTable.Label: MasterInvasionOptimization1_Name
StringTable.String: Planetary Bombardment

StringTable.Label: MasterInvasionOptimization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows Planetary Bombardments to be conducted during invasions.

StringTable.Label: MasterInvasionOptimization1_Dec
StringTable.String: So it turns out that thanks to the properties of mass, the easiest way to pacify something is to just drop something on it. It takes a bit of practice to get right, but the practice is fun itself.

StringTable.Label: MasterInvasionOptimization_Name
StringTable.String: Invasion Optimization

StringTable.Label: MasterInvasionOptimization_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Unlocks advanced invasion tactics.

StringTable.Label: MasterInvasionOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: Good news! We've developed some new, possibly amoral, certainly effective techniques for pacifying enemy ground forces.

StringTable.Label: MasterInvasionOptimization2_Name
StringTable.String: Information Warfare

StringTable.Label: MasterInvasionOptimization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows Informational Warfare tactics to be used during invasions.

StringTable.Label: MasterInvasionOptimization2_Dec
StringTable.String: Information warfare lacks a certain visceral appeal. But EMPs and targeted hacking attacks can cripple an enemy's coordination and limit the effectiveness of their defenses without needing to risk any of our own viscera.

StringTable.Label: MasterInvasionOptimization3_Name
StringTable.String: Biological Warfare

StringTable.Label: MasterInvasionOptimization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows Biological Warfare tactics to be used during invasions.

StringTable.Label: MasterInvasionOptimization3_Dec
StringTable.String: Let's be honest. If we're now the alien invaders, there's no reason we have to pretend we're the good guys. Yes we'll have to live with the consequences of using biological weapons. But at least we'll be the ones who live.

StringTable.Label: MasterStallerMarines_Name
StringTable.String: Stellar Marines

StringTable.Label: MasterStallerMarines_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves soldier effectiveness and transport capacity.

StringTable.Label: MasterStallerMarines_Dec
StringTable.String: A greater understanding of the tactics and training required for effective ground-based combat has led to a new form of military unit which specializes in establishing beachheads in unfriendly gravity wells.

StringTable.Label: MasterGravitationalFocus1_Name
StringTable.String: Tidal Disruption

StringTable.Label: MasterGravitationalFocus1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows tidal disruption tactics to be used during invasions.

StringTable.Label: MasterGravitationalFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: By directing powerful gravitational fields at enemy ground defenses, we can induce flooding and even tectonic activity. The ground shall quake beneath our enemy's feet or feet-analogs.

StringTable.Label: MasterGravitationalFocus_Name
StringTable.String: Gravitational Focus

StringTable.Label: MasterGravitationalFocus_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Unlocks advanced invasion tactics.

StringTable.Label: MasterGravitationalFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: Our ability to manipulate gravitational fields presents several unique tactical possibilities for our ground forces. These are powerful weapons we're giving to guys with pretty thick skulls, so we should definitely remember to keep an eye on them.

StringTable.Label: MasterGravitationalFocus2_Name
StringTable.String: Core Detonation

StringTable.Label: MasterGravitationalFocus2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows core detonation tactics to be used during invasions.

StringTable.Label: MasterGravitationalFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: Inducing a planet to suddenly experience massive, worldwide volcanic activity is a pretty extreme step. That said, it certainly will pacify any hostiles. Also liquefy them.

StringTable.Label: MasterDroneSoldiers_Name
StringTable.String: Drone Soldiers

StringTable.Label: MasterDroneSoldiers_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves soldier effectiveness and transport capacity.

StringTable.Label: MasterDroneSoldiers_Dec
StringTable.String: There are massive benefits in unit reliability and coordination if our troops are programmed to unfailingly do what we tell them to. And we won't have to feel so bad about losing these ones.

StringTable.Label: MasterAdvancedInvasionTactics_Name
StringTable.String: Advanced Invasion Tactics

StringTable.Label: MasterAdvancedInvasionTactics_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves soldier effectiveness and allows construction of advanced transports.

StringTable.Label: MasterAdvancedInvasionTactics_Dec
StringTable.String: A new generation of invasion transports, along with a new generation of soldiers that don't mind being stacked like firewood, allows us to put boots on the ground faster than ever.

StringTable.Label: MasterDefensiveMeditation_Name
StringTable.String: Defensive Meditation

StringTable.Label: MasterDefensiveMeditation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of the Champion's Temple.

StringTable.Label: MasterDefensiveMeditation_Dec
StringTable.String: The Champion's Temple trains Altarians the intricacies of various martial techniques, and the reason why even an enlightened species must sometimes use force to defend the weak.

StringTable.Label: MasterAcquisitionTech_Name
StringTable.String: Acquisitions

StringTable.Label: MasterAcquisitionTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increase starbase range, and Awards one free Frigate.

StringTable.Label: MasterAcquisitionTech_Dec
StringTable.String: Our business must grow. And when the galaxy doesn't provide us empty worlds to grow with, we may have to acquire them from other parties. Developing the tools and techniques to do that now is more than prudent.

StringTable.Label: MasterAcquisitionSpecialization1_Name
StringTable.String: Weapons Quality

StringTable.Label: MasterAcquisitionSpecialization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves the quality of our weapon systems.

StringTable.Label: MasterAcquisitionSpecialization1_Dec
StringTable.String: Dedicating internal R and D resources to improving the effectiveness of our weapons systems will ensure that when our security forces need to use them, they won't need to use them twice.

StringTable.Label: MasterAcquisitionSpecialization_Name
StringTable.String: Acquisition Specialization

StringTable.Label: MasterAcquisitionSpecialization_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves our military systems.

StringTable.Label: MasterAcquisitionSpecialization_Dec
StringTable.String: Our security forces will have a much easier time acquiring other assets if the tools they use to do so are the best they can be.

StringTable.Label: MasterAcquisitionSpecialization2_Name
StringTable.String: Defense Quality

StringTable.Label: MasterAcquisitionSpecialization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves the quality of our defensive systems.

StringTable.Label: MasterAcquisitionSpecialization2_Dec
StringTable.String: A concentrated focus to improve the defensive technologies which protect our security fleets will ensure that those valuable assets aren't wasted when conducting security or acquisition operations.

StringTable.Label: MasterAcquisitionSpecialization3_Name
StringTable.String: Ship Quality

StringTable.Label: MasterAcquisitionSpecialization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves the hit points of our ships.

StringTable.Label: MasterAcquisitionSpecialization3_Dec
StringTable.String: Making the ships used by our security fleets more durable will increase their effectiveness and staying power in high-risk security or acquisition operations.

StringTable.Label: MasterJihadTech_Name
StringTable.String: Jihad

StringTable.Label: MasterJihadTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows Holy War to commence.

StringTable.Label: MasterJihadTech_Dec
StringTable.String: The galaxy is filled with close-minded individuals who resist being shown the Path, or even struggle against it. They must be dealt with harshly. Our own salvation rests on their conversion.

StringTable.Label: MasterJihadFocus1_Name
StringTable.String: Shadow Warriors

StringTable.Label: MasterJihadFocus1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increase Soldiering Ability.

StringTable.Label: MasterJihadFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: Those that follow The Path of Shadows understand that when Force is called for, it must be total, overwhelming, and unstoppable. When the unbelievers meet our Shadow Warriors they shall see the truth of the Path firsthand.

StringTable.Label: MasterJihadFocus_Name
StringTable.String: Krynniac Jihad

StringTable.Label: MasterJihadFocus_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves planetary Holy War capabilities.

StringTable.Label: MasterJihadFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: Those that fallow the Path have no fear, their faith filling them with confidence and a strength that can be used against the unbelievers in a variety of ways.

StringTable.Label: MasterJihadFocus2_Name
StringTable.String: Devout Defenders

StringTable.Label: MasterJihadFocus2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases Planetary Defense

StringTable.Label: MasterJihadFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: The Path teaches that when our lives and salvation are under threat, everyone that walks the Path, regardless of caste or clan, must defend the Way to their dying breath.

StringTable.Label: MasterJihadFocus3_Name
StringTable.String: Steadfast Faith

StringTable.Label: MasterJihadFocus3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Planets resist culture flipping much longer.

StringTable.Label: MasterJihadFocus3_Dec
StringTable.String: The Path teaches that it is the only acceptable means of finding salvation, and that the customs of unbelievers should be shunned, as they are anathema to the Way.

StringTable.Label: MasterDevineFleets_Name
StringTable.String: Divine Fleets

StringTable.Label: MasterDevineFleets_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows for the construction of the Divine Temple Support Module.

StringTable.Label: MasterDevineFleets_Dec
StringTable.String: Divine Temples can be installed on appropriately anointed vessels, providing all ships in a fleet a certainty of purpose that they are fighting a righteous cause.

StringTable.Label: MasterUndauntedCrews_Name
StringTable.String: Undaunted Crews

StringTable.Label: MasterUndauntedCrews_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the Hit points of all our ships.

StringTable.Label: MasterUndauntedCrews_Dec
StringTable.String: Those who truly walk the Path do not feel the pains inflicted by the world, and will not panic when a ship is crumbling around them, standing and fighting until their last breath.

StringTable.Label: MasterDevineMastery_Name
StringTable.String: Divine Mastery

StringTable.Label: MasterDevineMastery_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves ship based Holy War capabilities.

StringTable.Label: MasterDevineMastery_Dec
StringTable.String: Crews and officers that fully master the Path and comprehend the Way in all its beauty will find that the weapons of the unbelievers hold less menace for them.

StringTable.Label: MasterRighteousStrength_Name
StringTable.String: Righteous Strength

StringTable.Label: MasterRighteousStrength_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the defenses of all our ships.

StringTable.Label: MasterRighteousStrength_Dec
StringTable.String: Whether it's due to the ingenuity of our crews, or the intervention of a higher power, our dedication to the Path gives our ship's defenses a righteous strength that helps protect against even the most devastating attacks.

StringTable.Label: MasterVicious_Name
StringTable.String: Vicious

StringTable.Label: MasterVicious_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increase Soldiering and Resistance.

StringTable.Label: MasterVicious_Dec
StringTable.String: The Snathi know that being small makes us vulnerable to the larger races. However, we make up for our size with pure viciousness. There are many advantages to always starting a battle with a low blow.

StringTable.Label: MasterUnbrokenSpirt_Name
StringTable.String: Unbroken Spirt

StringTable.Label: MasterUnbrokenSpirt_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Boost the Hitpoints of our ships.

StringTable.Label: MasterUnbrokenSpirt_Dec
StringTable.String: Our crews have tasted the lash of slavery, but they have not broken. Now they and their ships have the ability to withstand even the harshest onslaughts.

StringTable.Label: MasterDefensiveDiscipline_Name
StringTable.String: Defensive Discipline

StringTable.Label: MasterDefensiveDiscipline_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Makes our ship crews more effective when in defensive maneuvers.

StringTable.Label: MasterDefensiveDiscipline_Dec
StringTable.String: Our pilots have learned to link with their ships, and though disciplined thoughts, they can now maneuver their ships, with a nimbleness far beyond normal manual control.

StringTable.Label: MasterDefensiveTrance_Name
StringTable.String: Defensive Trance

StringTable.Label: MasterDefensiveTrance_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Greatly increase the abilities of our ships to withstand damage.

StringTable.Label: MasterDefensiveTrance_Dec
StringTable.String: Some of our more gifted pilots have taken the Defensive Discipline to a new level. They can go into a trance, becoming one with their ships. Allowing them to control their ships like their own bodies. The end result is they are able to move through intensive fire without faltering.

StringTable.Label: MasterFortification_Name
StringTable.String: Fortification

StringTable.Label: MasterFortification_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of defensive fortifications, and improves planetary defense.

StringTable.Label: MasterFortification_Dec
StringTable.String: We mustn't neglect our own defenses, and with the latest generation of defensive fortifications, our planets and starbases will be able to put up a much tougher fight.

StringTable.Label: MasterOrbitalDefencePlatform_Name
StringTable.String: Orbital Defense Platform

StringTable.Label: MasterOrbitalDefencePlatform_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Adds defensive fighters to orbit, improves planetary defense.

StringTable.Label: MasterOrbitalDefencePlatform_Dec
StringTable.String: A dedicated orbital defense platform will provide an additional layer of defense for our planetary systems, and take some of the defensive responsibility off of our starbases.

StringTable.Label: MasterPlanetaryDefenseDome_Name
StringTable.String: Planetary Defense Dome

StringTable.Label: MasterPlanetaryDefenseDome_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of planetary defense dome, improves planetary defense.

StringTable.Label: MasterPlanetaryDefenseDome_Dec
StringTable.String: With the resources and energy available to ground-based structures, we're now able to construct a shielded dome with so many layers of redundancy that it's effectively invulnerable to any orbital bombardment.

StringTable.Label: MasterDefenseSystemTech_Name
StringTable.String: Defense Systems

StringTable.Label: MasterDefenseSystemTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of basic defensive systems.

StringTable.Label: MasterDefenseSystemTech_Dec
StringTable.String: Naval crews are notoriously squishy, and otherwise difficult to protect in a ship that operates in hard vacuum. But we've got to do something, or they're going to stop getting in the ships.

StringTable.Label: MasterShieldSystems_Name
StringTable.String: Shield Systems

StringTable.Label: MasterShieldSystems_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved shield systems.

StringTable.Label: MasterShieldSystems_Dec
StringTable.String: No longer must our ships cower behind crude deflector fields. The latest generation of shields, although expensive, are capable of stopping incoming attacks outright, rather than just deflecting or diffusing their impact.

StringTable.Label: MasterShieldOptimization1_Name
StringTable.String: Shield Enhancement

StringTable.Label: MasterShieldOptimization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases shield strength.

StringTable.Label: MasterShieldOptimization1_Dec
StringTable.String: Of all the suggestions we've received from the field on how to improve our shield systems, "Please make them bigger," seemed to be the most popular. So we've done that.

StringTable.Label: MasterShieldOptimization_Name
StringTable.String: Shield Optimization

StringTable.Label: MasterShieldOptimization_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves shield systems.

StringTable.Label: MasterShieldOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: We've received quite a bit of useful data on real world performance of our shield systems, and have devised several possible improvements we can begin making to them.

StringTable.Label: MasterShieldOptimization2_Name
StringTable.String: Low Cost Shield Systems

StringTable.Label: MasterShieldOptimization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces shield cost.

StringTable.Label: MasterShieldOptimization2_Dec
StringTable.String: We probably shouldn't talk in front of the troops about our efforts to make our shield systems cheaper, even if it means more shields to go around for everyone. Because that's not how they'll see it.

StringTable.Label: MasterShieldOptimization3_Name
StringTable.String: Shield Miniaturization

StringTable.Label: MasterShieldOptimization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces shield mass.

StringTable.Label: MasterShieldOptimization3_Dec
StringTable.String: The first few generation of field emitters used in our shield systems were incredibly bulky and cumbersome. And they still are, frankly. Just a bit less so now.

StringTable.Label: MasterBarrierFieldGeneration_Name
StringTable.String: Barrier Field Generation

StringTable.Label: MasterBarrierFieldGeneration_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced shield systems.

StringTable.Label: MasterBarrierFieldGeneration_Dec
StringTable.String: The latest generation of shields, the so-called Barrier Field, is capable of absorbing a portion of the energy which strikes it. This dramatically increases the energy efficiency of the system, allowing for ultimately much more powerful shields.

StringTable.Label: MasterEnergyDefenseMiniauturization_Name
StringTable.String: Energy Defense Optimization

StringTable.Label: MasterEnergyDefenseMiniauturization_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces the size of shield emitters.

StringTable.Label: MasterEnergyDefenseMiniauturization_Dec
StringTable.String: Once again our civilization's amazing engineers have come through. The lives of our crew will be ever grateful to the talented engineers that reduced the size of the defensive measures on our ships.

StringTable.Label: MasterForceFieldTech_Name
StringTable.String: Force Fields

StringTable.Label: MasterForceFieldTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of exotic shield systems.

StringTable.Label: MasterForceFieldTech_Dec
StringTable.String: The latest generation of shields are capable of directing vast amounts of additional energy to a specific section of shields within nanoseconds of the moment of impact, allowing for shields which are much stronger relative to their respective weight.

StringTable.Label: MasterInvulnerabilityTech_Name
StringTable.String: Invulnerability

StringTable.Label: MasterInvulnerabilityTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of the ultimate shield systems.

StringTable.Label: MasterInvulnerabilityTech_Dec
StringTable.String: "Invulnerable" may be a bit of an exaggeration. Our researchers allow that some theoretical weapons could penetrate these shields. But those would be some pretty terrifying weapons, and even then you'd rather be behind this shield than not.

StringTable.Label: MasterShieldSupportSystems_Name
StringTable.String: Shield Support Systems

StringTable.Label: MasterShieldSupportSystems_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of shield support systems.

StringTable.Label: MasterShieldSupportSystems_Dec
StringTable.String: Advances in the focusing capabilities of our shield generators has given us the ability to generate and augment the shields of friendly ships. This should provide massive tactical and strategic options for fleet operations.

StringTable.Label: MasterShieldAugmentation_Name
StringTable.String: Shield Augmentation

StringTable.Label: MasterShieldAugmentation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved shield support systems.

StringTable.Label: MasterShieldAugmentation_Dec
StringTable.String: The same technology we've used to generate shields at a distance can now be done with our Barrier Field systems, allowing for even greater improvements in fleet survivability.

StringTable.Label: MasterEnergyFieldManipulation_Name
StringTable.String: Energy Field Manipulation

StringTable.Label: MasterEnergyFieldManipulation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced shield support systems.

StringTable.Label: MasterEnergyFieldManipulation_Dec
StringTable.String: Our mastery of the energy fields needed to create and maintain shields has resulted in a couple interesting new technologies, capable of interfering with enemy shield systems, or massively shielding friendly units within range.

StringTable.Label: MasterPointDefenses_Name
StringTable.String: Point Defenses

StringTable.Label: MasterPointDefenses_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of point defense systems.

StringTable.Label: MasterPointDefenses_Dec
StringTable.String: Arrays of tiny computer controlled railguns that track and destroy incoming missiles are unparalleled at protecting ships and starbases from missile attacks, though they still aren't terribly helpful at defending against other classes of weapons.

StringTable.Label: MasterPointDefenseOptimization1_Name
StringTable.String: Smart Point Defenses

StringTable.Label: MasterPointDefenseOptimization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases point defense strength.

StringTable.Label: MasterPointDefenseOptimization1_Dec
StringTable.String: A careful analysis of various missile performance envelopes has led us to adjust the firing patterns of our point defense systems, making them a bit more effective.

StringTable.Label: MasterPointDefenseOptimization_Name
StringTable.String: Point Defense Optimization

StringTable.Label: MasterPointDefenseOptimization_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves point defense systems.

StringTable.Label: MasterPointDefenseOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: Optimizing our point defense systems should lead to a number of different performance gains. Like possibly less exploded ships.

StringTable.Label: MasterPointDefenseOptimization2_Name
StringTable.String: Low Cost Point Defenses

StringTable.Label: MasterPointDefenseOptimization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces point defense cost.

StringTable.Label: MasterPointDefenseOptimization2_Dec
StringTable.String: The sensor equipment our point defense systems use is fairly specialized equipment that was initially quite rare and costly. Now that we're building a lot of point defenses, the price of those systems is starting to come down.

StringTable.Label: MasterPointDefenseOptimization3_Name
StringTable.String: Point Defense Miniaturization

StringTable.Label: MasterPointDefenseOptimization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces point defense mass.

StringTable.Label: MasterPointDefenseOptimization3_Dec
StringTable.String: The slugs fired by point defenses don't need to be large, and were limited by the fact that we couldn't build railguns any smaller. But now that we can build more compact units, we should see significant weight savings for all our point defense systems.

StringTable.Label: MasterCounterMeasures_Name
StringTable.String: Counter Measures

StringTable.Label: MasterCounterMeasures_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced point defense systems.

StringTable.Label: MasterCounterMeasures_Dec
StringTable.String: By deploying electronic counter measures which interfere with and confuse incoming missile attacks, we've greatly increased the survivability of our ships and starbases. Against missiles at least. Still hard to confuse a laser.

StringTable.Label: MasterCounterTargetingComputers_Name
StringTable.String: Counter Targeting Computers

StringTable.Label: MasterCounterTargetingComputers_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Eliminates the need to reserve space in point defenses for targeting computers.

StringTable.Label: MasterCounterTargetingComputers_Dec
StringTable.String: Our scientists have successfully developed a centralized computer system that manages the point defenses ship-wide making individual computers on each defensive module redundant.

StringTable.Label: MasterDroneSentrySystems_Name
StringTable.String: Drone Sentry Systems

StringTable.Label: MasterDroneSentrySystems_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of exotic point defense systems.

StringTable.Label: MasterDroneSentrySystems_Dec
StringTable.String: By installing our point defense systems on drone platforms that orbit our ships at a distance, we can add a valuable extra layer of protection against missile attacks.

StringTable.Label: MasterArreonMissileDefenseTech_Name
StringTable.String: Aereon Missile Defense

StringTable.Label: MasterArreonMissileDefenseTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of the ultimate point defense systems.

StringTable.Label: MasterArreonMissileDefenseTech_Dec
StringTable.String: The ultimate in point defense technology, featuring the latest generation of micro-drones armed with railguns, ECM and smart chafe. Aereon systems fill the space around a ship with a cloud of debris so thick no enemy missiles are likely to survive.

StringTable.Label: MasterPointDefenseSupportSystem_Name
StringTable.String: Point Defense Support

StringTable.Label: MasterPointDefenseSupportSystem_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of point defense support systems.

StringTable.Label: MasterPointDefenseSupportSystem_Dec
StringTable.String: Our experience working with small scale point defenses has led to a type of long range missile tracking system which should enhance the point defense capabilities of an entire fleet.

StringTable.Label: MasterPointDefenseAugmentation_Name
StringTable.String: Point Defense Augmentation

StringTable.Label: MasterPointDefenseAugmentation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved point defense support systems.

StringTable.Label: MasterPointDefenseAugmentation_Dec
StringTable.String: Wide area missile disruptors enhance the effectiveness of our existing counter measures, adding a much needed layer of extra missile security to our fleets.

StringTable.Label: MasterPointDefenseManipulation_Name
StringTable.String: Point Defense Manipulation

StringTable.Label: MasterPointDefenseManipulation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced point defense support systems.

StringTable.Label: MasterPointDefenseManipulation_Dec
StringTable.String: Fleet-wide drone systems will provide massive missile security to an entire fleet. Additionally, we can now equip point defense disruptors, essentially a type of counter-counter-measure, which should boost the effectiveness of our own missile attacks.

StringTable.Label: MasterArmorSystems_Name
StringTable.String: Armor Systems

StringTable.Label: MasterArmorSystems_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved armor systems.

StringTable.Label: MasterArmorSystems_Dec
StringTable.String: A big lump of ultra-dense material remains an effective, if unsubtle, method of protection from modern space-based weaponry. Subtlety is overrated though.

StringTable.Label: MasterArmorOptimization1_Name
StringTable.String: Reinforced Armor

StringTable.Label: MasterArmorOptimization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases armor strength.

StringTable.Label: MasterArmorOptimization1_Dec
StringTable.String: A simple mistake by one of our fabricators resulted in a set of armor panels marginally denser and more resilient than we'd seen before. It took us a long time to replicate that mistake, but now that we have, our ships should be a little tougher to kill.

StringTable.Label: MasterArmorOptimization_Name
StringTable.String: Armor Optimization

StringTable.Label: MasterArmorOptimization_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves armor systems.

StringTable.Label: MasterArmorOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: We've blown up lots and lots of slabs of armor on the test range, and have come up with a few possible improvements we could make to our armor systems.

StringTable.Label: MasterArmorOptimization2_Name
StringTable.String: Low-Cost Armor

StringTable.Label: MasterArmorOptimization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces armor cost.

StringTable.Label: MasterArmorOptimization2_Dec
StringTable.String: One of the biggest challenges with armor manufacturing was simply the logistics of moving rare and heavy resources and materials around. Now that we've got our supply chain sorted out, we can expect to see some nice cost savings.

StringTable.Label: MasterArmorOptimization3_Name
StringTable.String: Armor Miniaturization

StringTable.Label: MasterArmorOptimization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces armor mass.

StringTable.Label: MasterArmorOptimization3_Dec
StringTable.String: By its very nature, armor is always going to be a mass-intensive means of protection. That said, we can do a few things to improve the precision and fit of armor plating, which should cut down on weight a bit.

StringTable.Label: MasterDurantiumCompositeTech_Name
StringTable.String: Durantium Composite

StringTable.Label: MasterDurantiumCompositeTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced armor systems.

StringTable.Label: MasterDurantiumCompositeTech_Dec
StringTable.String: Certain materials, when stacked in specific arrangements have a synergistic effect on the strength of their neighbors under compressive forces. We call these new composites Durantium, and they should tremendously increase the survivability of our ships.

StringTable.Label: MasterArmorMaterialsScience_Name
StringTable.String: Armor Materials Science

StringTable.Label: MasterArmorMaterialsScience_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves our understanding of kinetic energy defenses allowing for more optimized use of armor materials.

StringTable.Label: MasterArmorMaterialsScience_Dec
StringTable.String: The scientific community has finally recognized the importance of formalizing the material science behind defensive plating on our starships. Previously, our armor came from improvements relating to the manufacturing of civilian goods and services. Having a dedicated branch of armor science has allowed us to develop new amror materials with starships in mind.

StringTable.Label: MasterKanviumLaminateTech_Name
StringTable.String: Kanvium Laminate

StringTable.Label: MasterKanviumLaminateTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of exotic armor systems.

StringTable.Label: MasterKanviumLaminateTech_Dec
StringTable.String: Kanvium armor uses a new type of lamination which causes surrounding materials to partially fluidize on impact, deforming in a recoverable way. Impacts are spread out over a much larger area, then flow back into its original shape.

StringTable.Label: MasterZeroPointArmorTech_Name
StringTable.String: Zero Point Armor

StringTable.Label: MasterZeroPointArmorTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of the ultimate armor systems.

StringTable.Label: MasterZeroPointArmorTech_Dec
StringTable.String: We have a hard time proving zero-point armor even exists, only knowing of it by the effect it has. It appears to tap into the zero-point energy of the quantum vacuum to repulse incoming energy. It's almost impossibly tough, we can prove that much.

StringTable.Label: MasterArmorSupportSystems_Name
StringTable.String: Armor Support Systems

StringTable.Label: MasterArmorSupportSystems_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of armor support systems.

StringTable.Label: MasterArmorSupportSystems_Dec
StringTable.String: In the factory, we've begun producing armor plating with a variety of force field based technologies. By adapting these fields into ship modules, we can create a hardening effect at a distance, making every ship in a fleet substantially more durable.

StringTable.Label: MasterArmorEnhancement_Name
StringTable.String: Armor Enhancement

StringTable.Label: MasterArmorEnhancement_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved armor support systems.

StringTable.Label: MasterArmorEnhancement_Dec
StringTable.String: The fields that we use to generate hardening effects have twenty-seven different "poles" which can be cycled through, changing the alignment of the hardening effects in the affected material, generating substantially stronger, more resilient materials.

StringTable.Label: MasterIntegrityFieldProjection_Name
StringTable.String: Integrity Field Projection

StringTable.Label: MasterIntegrityFieldProjection_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced armor support systems.

StringTable.Label: MasterIntegrityFieldProjection_Dec
StringTable.String: Our latest generation of armoring fields no longer just generate hardening effects at a distance, but can induce material fluidization and shape recovery. These new Integrity Fields can make our fleets invulnerable to all but the most powerful attacks.

StringTable.Label: MasterCommunicationsTech_Name
StringTable.String: Governance

StringTable.Label: MasterCommunicationsTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows research of communications technologies.

StringTable.Label: MasterCommunicationsTech_Dec
StringTable.String: We've already seen glimpses of evidence that we're not alone in this galaxy. Which presents an incredible danger, but also, perhaps, an opportunity. But also, let's stress again, danger.

StringTable.Label: MasterTranslatorTech_Name
StringTable.String: Universal Translator

StringTable.Label: MasterTranslatorTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows us to begin communicating with aliens.

StringTable.Label: MasterTranslatorTech_Dec
StringTable.String: Intense study of the fragments of alien text and speech has allowed us to create a Universal Translator that will let us communicate with any new races we come across.

StringTable.Label: MasterNonCrusadeTranslatorTech_Name
StringTable.String: Universal Translator

StringTable.Label: MasterNonCrusadeTranslatorTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows us to begin communicating with aliens.

StringTable.Label: MasterNonCrusadeTranslatorTech_Dec
StringTable.String: Intense study of the fragments of alien text and speech has allowed us to create a Universal Translator that will let us communicate with any new races we come across.

StringTable.Label: MasterMinistryOfAliensAffairs_Name
StringTable.String: Ministry of Alien Affairs

StringTable.Label: MasterMinistryOfAliensAffairs_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Provides a framework for our colonies to interact with alien species.

StringTable.Label: MasterMinistryOfAliensAffairs_Dec
StringTable.String: It's one thing to know about aliens. It's entirely another thing to know how to work with them. The Ministry of Alien Affairs is a new service designed to streamline the process of interacting with alien species.

StringTable.Label: MasterInterstellarGovernance_Name
StringTable.String: Interstellar Governance

StringTable.Label: MasterInterstellarGovernance_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Provides a leader and increases administration.

StringTable.Label: MasterInterstellarGovernance_Dec
StringTable.String: Governing a civilization on this scale parallels our experience exploring our own world hundreds of years ago. A history we'd better refamiliarize ourselves with quickly, before we get any space tea dumped in our harbors.

StringTable.Label: MasterNonCrusadeInterstellarGovernance_Name
StringTable.String: Interstellar Governance

StringTable.Label: MasterNonCrusadeInterstellarGovernance_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases administration.

StringTable.Label: MasterNonCrusadeInterstellarGovernance_Dec
StringTable.String: Governing a civilization on this scale parallels our experience exploring our own world hundreds of years ago. A history we'd better refamiliarize ourselves with quickly, before we get any space tea dumped in our harbors.

StringTable.Label: MasterGalacticGovernance_Name
StringTable.String: Galactic Governance

StringTable.Label: MasterGalacticGovernance_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Provides a free leader and 3 more administrative points.

StringTable.Label: MasterGalacticGovernance_Dec
StringTable.String: By granting limited powers of self-rule to various elements of society, reserving the most critical functions for our own central government, we expect to see increased public satisfaction and all the benefits which come with it.

StringTable.Label: MasterNonCrusadeGalacticGovernance_Name
StringTable.String: Galactic Governance

StringTable.Label: MasterNonCrusadeGalacticGovernance_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Provides 3 more administrative points.

StringTable.Label: MasterNonCrusadeGalacticGovernance_Dec
StringTable.String: By granting limited powers of self-rule to various elements of society, reserving the most critical functions for our own central government, we expect to see increased public satisfaction and all the benefits which come with it.

StringTable.Label: MasterInterstellarDemocracyTech_Name
StringTable.String: Technocracy

StringTable.Label: MasterInterstellarDemocracyTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Provides a free leader and 3 more administraive points.

StringTable.Label: MasterInterstellarDemocracyTech_Dec
StringTable.String: A system which lets people pick their own rulers, or at least think they're picking their own rulers, has obvious merits in terms of approval and productivity, although adapting it to a civilization this big has proven challenging.

StringTable.Label: MasterNonCrusadeInterstellarDemocracyTech_Name
StringTable.String: Technocracy

StringTable.Label: MasterNonCrusadeInterstellarDemocracyTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Provides 3 more administraive points.

StringTable.Label: MasterNonCrusadeInterstellarDemocracyTech_Dec
StringTable.String: A system which lets people pick their own rulers, or at least think they're picking their own rulers, has obvious merits in terms of approval and productivity, although adapting it to a civilization this big has proven challenging.

StringTable.Label: MasterStarFederationTech_Name
StringTable.String: Star Federation

StringTable.Label: MasterStarFederationTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Provides a free leader and 3 more administraive points.

StringTable.Label: MasterStarFederationTech_Dec
StringTable.String: The ultimate in space based governance, an ideal blend of all the freedoms, responsibilities, and delicious seasonings which make up an ideal civic life.

StringTable.Label: MasterNonCrusadeStarFederationTech_Name
StringTable.String: Star Federation

StringTable.Label: MasterNonCrusadeStarFederationTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Provides 3 more administraive points.

StringTable.Label: MasterNonCrusadeStarFederationTech_Dec
StringTable.String: The ultimate in space based governance, an ideal blend of all the freedoms, responsibilities, and delicious seasonings which make up an ideal civic life.

StringTable.Label: MasterDiplomacyTech_Name
StringTable.String: Diplomacy

StringTable.Label: MasterDiplomacyTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of embassies and the formation of basic treaties. Provides a Diplomat.

StringTable.Label: MasterDiplomacyTech_Dec
StringTable.String: The profit potential an alliance with our neighbors offers is something we should always consider. And failing that, the cost of talking with them will be a fraction of the cost of going to war with then.

StringTable.Label: MasterNonCrusadeDiplomacyTech_Name
StringTable.String: Diplomacy

StringTable.Label: MasterNonCrusadeDiplomacyTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of embassies and the formation of basic treaties.

StringTable.Label: MasterNonCrusadeDiplomacyTech_Dec
StringTable.String: The profit potential an alliance with our neighbors offers is something we should always consider. And failing that, the cost of talking with them will be a fraction of the cost of going to war with then.

StringTable.Label: MasterInterstellarAlliances_Name
StringTable.String: Interstellar Alliances

StringTable.Label: MasterInterstellarAlliances_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved diplomatic buildings. Increases Diplomacy.

StringTable.Label: MasterInterstellarAlliances_Dec
StringTable.String: Turning a friendly species into a formal ally is a supremely delicate process. There's only one way these talks can go right, and a thousand ways they can go wrong. The etiquette of alien handshakes alone is fraught with peril.

StringTable.Label: MasterEminenceTech_Name
StringTable.String: Eminence

StringTable.Label: MasterEminenceTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced diplomatic buildings. Increases Diplomacy.

StringTable.Label: MasterEminenceTech_Dec
StringTable.String: A civilization which takes diplomacy seriously and has a long record of fair-minded dealing will always carry a greater voice at the bargaining table. Our people are building that reputation now, and are stronger for it.

StringTable.Label: MasterMajestyTech_Name
StringTable.String: Majesty

StringTable.Label: MasterMajestyTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows formation of assimilation treaties.

StringTable.Label: MasterMajestyTech_Dec
StringTable.String: The galaxy wants to believe every word we say. So sterling is our reputation, that our diplomats often find whole worlds begging to join our culture. The pen hasn't just beaten the sword; it's humiliated it.

StringTable.Label: MasterEspionageTech_Name
StringTable.String: Espionage

StringTable.Label: MasterEspionageTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows for the training of Agents that can be used to destabilize and surveille other Races.

StringTable.Label: MasterEspionageTech_Dec
StringTable.String: Some of our more conniving Researchers have been able to put together a training program for the training of Espionage Agents. If we are willing to build some training centers for these Agents we should soon be able to keep a better eye on what other races are up to, and even make things a bit more difficult for them if we don't like it.

StringTable.Label: MasterXenoCommerce_Name
StringTable.String: Xeno Commerce

StringTable.Label: MasterXenoCommerce_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of basic economic buildings and freighters.

StringTable.Label: MasterXenoCommerce_Dec
StringTable.String: An economy which spans the stars is a pretty complicated beast. We don't need to understand it all of course, just supply the facilities and light regulations for the free market to get to work doing what it does best.

StringTable.Label: MasterDigitalExchange_Name
StringTable.String: Digital Exchange

StringTable.Label: MasterDigitalExchange_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the efficacy of trade between colonies and other species.

StringTable.Label: MasterDigitalExchange_Dec
StringTable.String: Increases the efficacy of trade between colonies and other species.

StringTable.Label: MasterCulturalExchange_Name
StringTable.String: Cultural Exchange

StringTable.Label: MasterCulturalExchange_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Begin spreading your cultural influence across the galaxy and earning a profit from it.

StringTable.Label: MasterCulturalExchange_Dec
StringTable.String: Every parsec that falls under our influence represents an opportunity to persaude those who are exposed to it to our way of life.

StringTable.Label: MasterNonCrusadeCulturalExchange_Name
StringTable.String: Cultural Exchange

StringTable.Label: MasterNonCrusadeCulturalExchange_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Begin spreading your cultural influence across the galaxy and earning a profit from it.

StringTable.Label: MasterNonCrusadeCulturalExchange_Dec
StringTable.String: Every parsec that falls under our influence represents an opportunity to persaude those who are exposed to it to our way of life.

StringTable.Label: MasterImmigration_Name
StringTable.String: Interstellar Immigration

StringTable.Label: MasterImmigration_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Encourages aliens to begin making our worlds a home. Increases population growth but reduces approval.

StringTable.Label: MasterImmigration_Dec
StringTable.String: Immigration is a great way to increase population and supply valuable labor. But not everyone approves of alien immigration.

StringTable.Label: MasterOpenImmigration_Name
StringTable.String: Open Immigration

StringTable.Label: MasterOpenImmigration_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Encourages aliens to begin making our worlds a home. Increases population growth but reduces approval.

StringTable.Label: MasterOpenImmigration_Dec
StringTable.String: By opening our worlds to broader immigration we can significantly increase our population growth. However, not all of our people will be thrilled with having aliens living amongst them potentially taking jobs.

StringTable.Label: MasterOpenCitizenship_Name
StringTable.String: Open Citizenship

StringTable.Label: MasterOpenCitizenship_ShortDec
