StringTable.String: Encourages aliens to begin making our worlds a home. Increases population growth but reduces approval.

StringTable.Label: MasterOpenCitizenship_Dec
StringTable.String: We no longer care where you came from. If you want to make our planets your home, you are granted citizenship. This policy will not make everyone happy but it will help us build up our population quickly.

StringTable.Label: MasterCulturalInfluence_Name
StringTable.String: Cultural Influence

StringTable.Label: MasterCulturalInfluence_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of basic cultural buildings. Increases Influence. Provides a Celebrity.

StringTable.Label: MasterCulturalInfluence_Dec
StringTable.String: A strong cultural presence, on our worlds and our neighbors' has tremendous long term potential. It lacks some of the visceral appeal of a new type of mass driver, but may in the long run be far more effective at securing humanity's future.

StringTable.Label: MasterNonCrusadeCulturalInfluence_Name
StringTable.String: Cultural Influence

StringTable.Label: MasterNonCrusadeCulturalInfluence_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of basic cultural buildings. Increases Influence.

StringTable.Label: MasterNonCrusadeCulturalInfluence_Dec
StringTable.String: A strong cultural presence, on our worlds and our neighbors' has tremendous long term potential. It lacks some of the visceral appeal of a new type of mass driver, but may in the long run be far more effective at securing humanity's future.

StringTable.Label: MasterCulturalOutreach_Name
StringTable.String: Cultural Outreach

StringTable.Label: MasterCulturalOutreach_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved cultural buildings. Increases Influence.

StringTable.Label: MasterCulturalOutreach_Dec
StringTable.String: By building facilities that focus on spreading our cultural accomplishments amongst our civilians and neighbors, we expect to see even more influence in this region of space, or at the very least, more awards from the artistic community.

StringTable.Label: MasterNonCrusadeCulturalOutreach_Name
StringTable.String: Cultural Outreach

StringTable.Label: MasterNonCrusadeCulturalOutreach_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved cultural buildings. Increases Influence.

StringTable.Label: MasterNonCrusadeCulturalOutreach_Dec
StringTable.String: By building facilities that focus on spreading our cultural accomplishments amongst our civilians and neighbors, we expect to see even more influence in this region of space, or at the very least, more awards from the artistic community.

StringTable.Label: MasterStellarEmigration_Name
StringTable.String: Stellar Emigration

StringTable.Label: MasterStellarEmigration_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced cultural buildings. Increases Influence.

StringTable.Label: MasterStellarEmigration_Dec
StringTable.String: Humans are admired throughout the galaxy, reflecting the success of our civilization. If we can make the process of emigration easier, we can spread our influence wider still.

StringTable.Label: MasterNonCrusadeStellarEmigration_Name
StringTable.String: Stellar Emigration

StringTable.Label: MasterNonCrusadeStellarEmigration_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced cultural buildings. Increases Influence.

StringTable.Label: MasterNonCrusadeStellarEmigration_Dec
StringTable.String: Humans are admired throughout the galaxy, reflecting the success of our civilization. If we can make the process of emigration easier, we can spread our influence wider still.

StringTable.Label: MasterCulturalAssimilation_Name
StringTable.String: Cultural Assimilation

StringTable.Label: MasterCulturalAssimilation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of exotic cultural buildings. Increases Influence.

StringTable.Label: MasterCulturalAssimilation_Dec
StringTable.String: Foreign cultures have such backwards ideas that we'll find great value in quickly assimilating and removing the cultural trappings of new arrivals. By doing so can increase the penetration and acceptance of our culture more still.

StringTable.Label: MasterNonCrusadeCulturalAssimilation_Name
StringTable.String: Cultural Assimilation

StringTable.Label: MasterNonCrusadeCulturalAssimilation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of exotic cultural buildings. Increases Influence.

StringTable.Label: MasterNonCrusadeCulturalAssimilation_Dec
StringTable.String: Foreign cultures have such backwards ideas that we'll find great value in quickly assimilating and removing the cultural trappings of new arrivals. By doing so can increase the penetration and acceptance of our culture more still.

StringTable.Label: MasterCulturalDomination_Name
StringTable.String: Cultural Domination

StringTable.Label: MasterCulturalDomination_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of the ultimate cultural buildings. Increases Influence.

StringTable.Label: MasterCulturalDomination_Dec
StringTable.String: There is no other culture in the galaxy but ours, and anyone who claims otherwise is a heretic. Or just dumb. All sane beings will soon bow down before our celebrities and thinkers.

StringTable.Label: MasterCulturalAffinity_Name
StringTable.String: Cultural Affinity

StringTable.Label: MasterCulturalAffinity_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Prepares civilization for Ascension.

StringTable.Label: MasterCulturalAffinity_Dec
StringTable.String: Other universes deserve the benefit of humanity's wisdom and culture. Indeed, it's a bit offensive that they don't see it already. Our thinkers are now beginning to prepare plans for shining our light on the next world, and beyond.

StringTable.Label: MasterTechnologicalOutreach_Name
StringTable.String: Technological Outreach

StringTable.Label: MasterTechnologicalOutreach_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Greatly Increases the spread of our colonies Influence for 15 Turns. (Capstone)

StringTable.Label: MasterTechnologicalOutreach_Dec
StringTable.String: Our researchers have been instructed to bend those giant brains of Thiers toward finding ways to reach out to the scientist and researchers of other races, and find ways to convince them our way of doing things is the best way to insure technological advancement for the galaxy as a whole.

StringTable.Label: MasterNonCrusadeTechnologicalOutreach_Name
StringTable.String: Technological Outreach

StringTable.Label: MasterNonCrusadeTechnologicalOutreach_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Greatly Increases the spread of our colonies Influence for 15 Turns. (Capstone)

StringTable.Label: MasterNonCrusadeTechnologicalOutreach_Dec
StringTable.String: Our researchers have been instructed to bend those giant brains of Thiers toward finding ways to reach out to the scientist and researchers of other races, and find ways to convince them our way of doing things is the best way to insure technological advancement for the galaxy as a whole.

StringTable.Label: MasterXenoArtifacts_Name
StringTable.String: Xeno Artifact Studies

StringTable.Label: MasterXenoArtifacts_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows us to make use of the alien artifacts we find on our worlds.

StringTable.Label: MasterXenoArtifacts_Dec
StringTable.String: Our anthropologists have been uncovering various artifacts for many years. Often, these artifacts were assumed to be merely unknown relics from some primitive native society. However, as our own technology has increased, we have concluded that some of these artifacts are actually technologies left over from some sort of ancient alien civilization. With this new understanding, our top scientists have proposed building foundations for each artifact we find to unlock their secrets.

StringTable.Label: MasterXenoArcheology_Name
StringTable.String: Xeno Archeology

StringTable.Label: MasterXenoArcheology_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases Precursor research allowing us to make greater use of their technology.

StringTable.Label: MasterXenoArcheology_Dec
StringTable.String: For some time, we've known of a race, or races, of long dead aliens called the Precursors. It's taken some time to adapt our survey systems to identify their relics, but now that we have, we hope to learn a few of their secrets. By constructing special scientific learning centers, called Foundations, on Precursor artifacts, we are able to make a single use of these Precursor artifacts which the press refer to as a "charge". Using these Precursor technologies will give us a tremendous advantage over other civilizations.

StringTable.Label: MasterPrecursorStudies_Name
StringTable.String: Precursor Studies

StringTable.Label: MasterPrecursorStudies_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases Precursor research allowing us to make greater use of their technology.

StringTable.Label: MasterPrecursorStudies_Dec
StringTable.String: Now that we've had an opportunity to study a few precursor relics, we've been able to detect patterns in them which have allowed us to build a framework which should greatly aid future Precursor research efforts.

StringTable.Label: MasterPrecusorFoundations_Name
StringTable.String: Advanced Foundations

StringTable.Label: MasterPrecusorFoundations_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases Precursor research allowing us to make greater use of their technology.

StringTable.Label: MasterPrecusorFoundations_Dec
StringTable.String: This latest technological breakthrough allows us to being constructing what we refer to as 'foundations' on the Precursor artifacts we find. These foundations are designed to allow us to interface our technology to theirs allowing us to gain an additional use (or charge) from a Precursor artifact.

StringTable.Label: MasterPrescursorInsight_Name
StringTable.String: Precursor Insight

StringTable.Label: MasterPrescursorInsight_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases Precursor research allowing us to make greater use of their technology.

StringTable.Label: MasterPrescursorInsight_Dec
StringTable.String: The Precursor foundations have allowed us to adapt our native technology to that of the Precursors. Their technology is still largely a mystery to us but we continue to find ways to adapt it for our uses. This latest breakthrough will allow us to construct more powerful foundations on the artifacts we discover allowing us to once again make use of these mysterious but powerful Precursor technologies.

StringTable.Label: MasterPrecursorInvestigation_Name
StringTable.String: Precursor Investigation

StringTable.Label: MasterPrecursorInvestigation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases Precursor research allowing us to make greater use of their technology.

StringTable.Label: MasterPrecursorInvestigation_Dec
StringTable.String: The study of Precursor relics requires very specialized equipment. The construction of dedicated facilities staffed with Precursor specialists will allow us to make the most of these incredible artifacts.

StringTable.Label: MasterPrecursorExploitation_Name
StringTable.String: Precursor Exploitation

StringTable.Label: MasterPrecursorExploitation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases Precursor research allowing us to make greater use of their technology.

StringTable.Label: MasterPrecursorExploitation_Dec
StringTable.String: The study of Precursor relics requires very specialized equipment. The construction of dedicated facilities staffed with Precursor specialists will allow us to make the most of these incredible artifacts.

StringTable.Label: MasterPrecursorEngineering_Name
StringTable.String: Precursor Engineering

StringTable.Label: MasterPrecursorEngineering_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases Precursor research allowing us to make greater use of their technology.

StringTable.Label: MasterPrecursorEngineering_Dec
StringTable.String: We're now able to try recreating some of the Precursor's technology. Extremely advanced fabrication equipment will be needed to continue this work, but the benefits to our other research programs could be immeasurable.

StringTable.Label: MasterPrecursorUnderstanding_Name
StringTable.String: Precursor Understanding

StringTable.Label: MasterPrecursorUnderstanding_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases Precursor research allowing us to make greater use of their technology.

StringTable.Label: MasterPrecursorUnderstanding_Dec
StringTable.String: Precursor relics reveal their secrets to us with ease now, and we're close to building our own relics ourselves. We have almost as full an understanding of Precursor technology as the Precursors did themselves.

StringTable.Label: MasterThePathTech_Name
StringTable.String: The Path

StringTable.Label: MasterThePathTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of the Krynniac Temple and Ministry.

StringTable.Label: MasterThePathTech_Dec
StringTable.String: The Path is the primary doctrine of the ancient Krynniac religion. It is the set of core teachings, ideals, and laws that the Krynn must live by to bring them closer to learning the true Way of the universe.

StringTable.Label: MasterTheCallingTech_Name
StringTable.String: The Calling

StringTable.Label: MasterTheCallingTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of the Krynniac Mission.

StringTable.Label: MasterTheCallingTech_Dec
StringTable.String: Once a Krynn has commenced along the Path, the next step is for them to find his or her Calling. It is though service to their Calling that the Krynn contribute to the overarching goal of our people, spreading the Krynniac Way.

StringTable.Label: MasterTheOrderTech_Name
StringTable.String: The Order

StringTable.Label: MasterTheOrderTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of the Krynniac Order and Sanctuary.

StringTable.Label: MasterTheOrderTech_Dec
StringTable.String: The Krynniac Orders were founded to help Krynn take the last step on the Path, and find the Way. These Orders are the glue which hold the Krynn together, ensuring the Krynniac Way will eventually be found by all.

StringTable.Label: MasterTheWayTech_Name
StringTable.String: The Way

StringTable.Label: MasterTheWayTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of the Krynniac Oracle.

StringTable.Label: MasterTheWayTech_Dec
StringTable.String: At the end of the Path one finds the Way. The Way reveals the truth of our universe to those who behold it, and teaches those so enlightened that they must forever help others walk the Path, until all beings in the universe live as one.

StringTable.Label: MasterTheWayPerfection1_Name
StringTable.String: The Way of Leadership

StringTable.Label: MasterTheWayPerfection1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases entire civilization's Influence.

StringTable.Label: MasterTheWayPerfection1_Dec
StringTable.String: Those that follow the Way must be able to educate and influence the lost. A select few choose to walk the Way of Leadership, to better equip them for securing the future of the Krynn, and all sentient life.

StringTable.Label: MasterTheWayPerfection_Name
StringTable.String: The Krynniac Way

StringTable.Label: MasterTheWayPerfection_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Enlightens our entire civilization.

StringTable.Label: MasterTheWayPerfection_Dec
StringTable.String: Those who have found the Way understand the importance of convincing the entire galaxy to walk the Path along with us. We must do anything we can do to support their work.

StringTable.Label: MasterTheWayPerfection2_Name
StringTable.String: The Way of Bliss

StringTable.Label: MasterTheWayPerfection2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases entire civilization's Approval.

StringTable.Label: MasterTheWayPerfection2_Dec
StringTable.String: The Way of Bliss teaches that for the Krynn to bring all sentient life to the Path we must achieve perfect harmony within our own civilization first.

StringTable.Label: MasterXenoEconomics_Name
StringTable.String: Xeno Economics

StringTable.Label: MasterXenoEconomics_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved economic buildings. Grants an Entrepreneur.

StringTable.Label: MasterXenoEconomics_Dec
StringTable.String: The sheer distance between buyers and sellers in this economy has resulted in us having to rewrite a number of different theories of economics. At minimum, some new banking and economic structures will be required to deal with all the complications.

StringTable.Label: MasterNonCrusadeXenoEconomics_Name
StringTable.String: Xeno Economics

StringTable.Label: MasterNonCrusadeXenoEconomics_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved economic buildings.

StringTable.Label: MasterNonCrusadeXenoEconomics_Dec
StringTable.String: The sheer distance between buyers and sellers in this economy has resulted in us having to rewrite a number of different theories of economics. At minimum, some new banking and economic structures will be required to deal with all the complications.

StringTable.Label: MasterInterstellarBanking_Name
StringTable.String: Interstellar Banking

StringTable.Label: MasterInterstellarBanking_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced economic buildings.

StringTable.Label: MasterInterstellarBanking_Dec
StringTable.String: Capital can now be transferred instantaneously. This has allowed a variety of creative arbitrage opportunities, which will require new regulations and banking theory to contain.

StringTable.Label: MasterFinancialSectorsTech_Name
StringTable.String: Financial Sectors

StringTable.Label: MasterFinancialSectorsTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of exotic economic buildings.

StringTable.Label: MasterFinancialSectorsTech_Dec
StringTable.String: Dedicated financial sectors should help facilitate the flow of capital across our civilization, which will result in more things being built in the places they need to. Wealth creation, in other words, which we can tap for a variety of purposes.

StringTable.Label: MasterGalacticStockMarket_Name
StringTable.String: Galactic Stock Market

StringTable.Label: MasterGalacticStockMarket_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of the ultimate economic buildings.

StringTable.Label: MasterGalacticStockMarket_Dec
StringTable.String: Stock exchanges have proven remarkably elusive to establish in this galaxy, and only the most recent advances in communications technology and regulatory capability have made them possible.

StringTable.Label: MasterEconomicStudy_Name
StringTable.String: Economic Study

StringTable.Label: MasterEconomicStudy_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Substantially boost our civilization's Wealth for 15 Turns. (Capstone)

StringTable.Label: MasterEconomicStudy_Dec
StringTable.String: It's seems for the right price we have been able to incentivize our researchers to focus on assorted ways to boost our colonies Wealth. Unfortunately, we will not be able to keep this up to long, or they will all realize they can make much better livings in the private sector.

StringTable.Label: MasterInterstellarTrade_Name
StringTable.String: Interstellar Trade

StringTable.Label: MasterInterstellarTrade_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of basic trading buildings. Adds one trade route.

StringTable.Label: MasterInterstellarTrade_Dec
StringTable.String: Exchanging goods with our neighbors will theoretically enrich us both, and is worth pursuing for that reason alone. Also, if we play it smart, it can enrich us a lot more than the other guy.

StringTable.Label: MasterGalacticTrade_Name
StringTable.String: Galactic Trade

StringTable.Label: MasterGalacticTrade_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved trading buildings. Adds two trade routes.

StringTable.Label: MasterGalacticTrade_Dec
StringTable.String: By establishing fixed trading hubs and encouraging the markets which develop around them, the wealth of the entire galactic community will flow through our hands. Our ever so slightly sticky hands.

StringTable.Label: MasterGalacticFacilitation_Name
StringTable.String: Galactic Facilitation

StringTable.Label: MasterGalacticFacilitation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced trading buildings. Adds two trade routes.

StringTable.Label: MasterGalacticFacilitation_Dec
StringTable.String: The sheer volume of goods that pass through a trading port is staggering, and we'll need new facilities to manage the flow of goods smoothly. And safely. We've had a few too many large masses make dock workers very, very flat.

StringTable.Label: MasterTradeMasters_Name
StringTable.String: Trade Masters

StringTable.Label: MasterTradeMasters_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of exotic trading buildings. Adds two trade routes.

StringTable.Label: MasterTradeMasters_Dec
StringTable.String: Our civilization is synonymous with wealth and trading, and all intelligent beings know our markets are the only viable place to show their goods. And of course certain advantages accrue to the owners of such a monopoly.

StringTable.Label: MasterXenoEntertainment_Name
StringTable.String: Xeno Entertainment

StringTable.Label: MasterXenoEntertainment_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of basic entertainment buildings. Increases Approval.

StringTable.Label: MasterXenoEntertainment_Dec
StringTable.String: Without the approval of our people, we won't be able to accomplish very much. Distracting them with various amusements is perhaps a cynical ploy, but it might be easier than trying to treat them as the rational beings they're so often not.

StringTable.Label: MasterInterstellarTourism_Name
StringTable.String: Interstellar Tourism

StringTable.Label: MasterInterstellarTourism_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved entertainment buildings. Begin collecting tourism income.

StringTable.Label: MasterInterstellarTourism_Dec
StringTable.String: Not only can we distract our own citizens with amusements, we can begin luring friendly visitors from our galactic neighbors. This will not only help improve relations, it should result in extra income for us.

StringTable.Label: MasterWondersoftheGalaxy_Name
StringTable.String: Wonders of the Galaxy

StringTable.Label: MasterWondersoftheGalaxy_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced tourism structures. Increases tourism income.

StringTable.Label: MasterWondersoftheGalaxy_Dec
StringTable.String: The galactic community is beginning to realize just how awesome humanity is, and if they aren't, we'll soon be airing targeted advertisements which tell them to. The increased tourism revenue is anticipated to be a nice bonus.

StringTable.Label: MasterPilgrimageTech_Name
StringTable.String: Pilgrimage

StringTable.Label: MasterPilgrimageTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of exotic tourism structures. Increases tourism income.

StringTable.Label: MasterPilgrimageTech_Dec
StringTable.String: There's not a single being in this galaxy that doesn't want to make a visit to human space. For many of them, it's a religious requirement. Our home has become the most important destination that intelligent life has ever known.

StringTable.Label: MasterBlackMarketTech_Name
StringTable.String: Black Market

StringTable.Label: MasterBlackMarketTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Lets us build a Black Market.

StringTable.Label: MasterBlackMarketTech_Dec
StringTable.String: Despite our best efforts, the slavelings often come into possession of various bits of money. By giving them a place to trade, we can boost their productivity, improving manufacturing and research.

StringTable.Label: MasterDimensionalFazing_Name
StringTable.String: Dimensional Phasing

StringTable.Label: MasterDimensionalFazing_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Jams enemy targeting systems.

StringTable.Label: MasterDimensionalFazing_Dec
StringTable.String: By manipulating dimensional phasing, we can make all of our ships more difficult to target, and our defense systems more powerful.

StringTable.Label: MasterDimensionalFazingFocus1_Name
StringTable.String: Shield Phasing

StringTable.Label: MasterDimensionalFazingFocus1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Boost the shield strength of our ships.

StringTable.Label: MasterDimensionalFazingFocus1_Dec
StringTable.String: We have found a way to apply dimensional phasing to our shield systems, making them more resistant to this universe's beam weapons.

StringTable.Label: MasterDimensionalFazingFocus_Name
StringTable.String: Dimensional Defense Focus

StringTable.Label: MasterDimensionalFazingFocus_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Boost the shield strength of our ships.

StringTable.Label: MasterDimensionalFazingFocus_Dec
StringTable.String: With Dimensional Phasing we can make existing defense systems more resilient.

StringTable.Label: MasterDimensionalFazingFocus2_Name
StringTable.String: Phased Point Defenses

StringTable.Label: MasterDimensionalFazingFocus2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Boost the Point Defense of our ships.

StringTable.Label: MasterDimensionalFazingFocus2_Dec
StringTable.String: We have found a way to apply dimensional pasing to our Point Defense systems, making them much more resistant to this universe's missile weapons.

StringTable.Label: MasterDimensionalFazingFocus3_Name
StringTable.String: Phased Armor

StringTable.Label: MasterDimensionalFazingFocus3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Strengthens the Armor of our ships.

StringTable.Label: MasterDimensionalFazingFocus3_Dec
StringTable.String: We have found a way to apply dimensional phasing to our Armor, making it more resistant to this universe's kinetic weapons.

StringTable.Label: MasterXenoAnthropology_Name
StringTable.String: Xeno Anthropology

StringTable.Label: MasterXenoAnthropology_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows the construction of the Xeno Anthropology Center.

StringTable.Label: MasterXenoAnthropology_Dec
StringTable.String: By studying the natives of this universe, we are able to better interact with them. It also allows us to educate them in the proper way of doing things, our way.

StringTable.Label: MasterAnthropologySpecialization1_Name
StringTable.String: Adaptive Anthropology

StringTable.Label: MasterAnthropologySpecialization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves relations with other races.

StringTable.Label: MasterAnthropologySpecialization1_Dec
StringTable.String: Adapting to the native ways of this universe allows us to better interact with other races, and avoid unfortunate miss understandings.

StringTable.Label: MasterAnthropologySpecialization_Name
StringTable.String: Anthropology Specialization

StringTable.Label: MasterAnthropologySpecialization_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves relations with other races.

StringTable.Label: MasterAnthropologySpecialization_Dec
StringTable.String: The study of the native being of this universe can be very helpful if we specialize our study.

StringTable.Label: MasterAnthropologySpecialization2_Name
StringTable.String: Educational Anthropology

StringTable.Label: MasterAnthropologySpecialization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Helps to spread our influence.

StringTable.Label: MasterAnthropologySpecialization2_Dec
StringTable.String: By educating the natives of this universe we are able to better spread our influence. Which allows us to expand without the need of conflict.

StringTable.Label: MasterAnthropologySpecialization3_Name
StringTable.String: Economic Anthropology

StringTable.Label: MasterAnthropologySpecialization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Helps to build our economy.

StringTable.Label: MasterAnthropologySpecialization3_Dec
StringTable.String: By studying the natives of this universe, we can find what they value most, allowing us to capitalize on their desires.

StringTable.Label: MasterUniversalOutreach_Name
StringTable.String: Universal Outreach

StringTable.Label: MasterUniversalOutreach_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows for the construction of the Universal Outreach Center.

StringTable.Label: MasterUniversalOutreach_Dec
StringTable.String: We have mastered the ways of this Universe. Now we can use our knowledge to better interact with the natives, further spreading our influence in the galaxy.

StringTable.Label: MasterFutureStudies_Name
StringTable.String: Future Studies

StringTable.Label: MasterFutureStudies_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows for the creation of the Future Studies Center.

StringTable.Label: MasterFutureStudies_Dec
StringTable.String: By studying what we know of the future, we are able to influence the fate of this dimension.

StringTable.Label: MasterMarketingTech_Name
StringTable.String: Marketing

StringTable.Label: MasterMarketingTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows for the construction of the Iridium Store.

StringTable.Label: MasterMarketingTech_Dec
StringTable.String: Our storefronts and marketplaces are more than just a place to earn a profit, although they certainly do that. They also serve as the public face of our company, the truest representation of what we are, and help spread our influence in the marketplace.

StringTable.Label: MasterInterstellarCommerce_Name
StringTable.String: Interstellar Commerce

StringTable.Label: MasterInterstellarCommerce_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of Iridium Center Improvement

StringTable.Label: MasterInterstellarCommerce_Dec
StringTable.String: A new generation of retail hub will be needed to showcase our latest products and services in the best possible light. Iridium Centers will increase the economic output of every world they're constructed on.

StringTable.Label: MasterMarketingMasters_Name
StringTable.String: Marketing Masters

StringTable.Label: MasterMarketingMasters_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of The Iridium World Improvement

StringTable.Label: MasterMarketingMasters_Dec
StringTable.String: Throughout the galaxy, sentient life talks of the marvels present in an Iridium World complex. Providing the ultimate consumption experience, Iridium Worlds boost the economy of their host worlds like few other structures.

StringTable.Label: MasterThePathofShadows_Name
StringTable.String: The Path of Shadows

StringTable.Label: MasterThePathofShadows_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of the Shadow Temple.

StringTable.Label: MasterThePathofShadows_Dec
StringTable.String: There have always been those who cannot find the Path, and even some who threaten its existence. To combat these influences, the Krynniac faith has established the Path of Shadows, whose followers preserve the prosperity of the Krynn in their own way.

StringTable.Label: MasterShadowEnforcers_Name
StringTable.String: Shadow Enforcers

StringTable.Label: MasterShadowEnforcers_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of the Enforcement Temple.

StringTable.Label: MasterShadowEnforcers_Dec
StringTable.String: The Path does not permit exploitation without authorization. Authorization granted to those that walk the Path of Shadows, who are free to collect tithes from devoted merchants and bankers to ensure their businesses suffer no misfortunes.

StringTable.Label: MasterShadowTrade_Name
StringTable.String: Shadow Trade

StringTable.Label: MasterShadowTrade_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the Income of trade routes, by allowing the trade of dubious goods.

StringTable.Label: MasterShadowTrade_Dec
StringTable.String: The Path of Shadows teaches that unbelievers will destroy themselves if given what they want most. Properly equipped with the right "merchandise," our traders can now profit from their customers' gluttony.

StringTable.Label: MasterKrynnConversionTech_Name
StringTable.String: Krynniac Conversion

StringTable.Label: MasterKrynnConversionTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increase tourism income and influence on all our worlds.

StringTable.Label: MasterKrynnConversionTech_Dec
StringTable.String: Our mastery of tourism is finally paying dividends. All who visit our worlds find themselves filled with the urge to return home and extol the virtues of the Path to their own kind.

StringTable.Label: Master_Dec
StringTable.String: c
